## Description

-   COP28 UAE will be a milestone moment when the world will take stock of its progress on the Paris Agreement.

-   COP28 UAE Presidency, in collaboration with WHO, the Wellcome Trust and partners, is hosting the first-ever Health Day at the COP28 UN Climate Conference, taking place in Dubai, the UAE from 30 November to 12 December 2023.
